name: Island Flight Courier
description:
Island Flight Courier is a third person exploration flight game in which you fly around an open world collecting resources.

Disasters will be inflicted upon the island, but using those resources collected you can defend the villages from damage. 

Unique features 

  • Relaxing flight experience
  • Plane vacuum
  • Natural disasters
  • Dynamic resources
  • Points of interest *
  • Social Balloons with resources in them *

*not yet added

This project has been pushed onto itch much earlier than originally planned because we need a way to play-test during the quarantine. We will be updating the version around every 2 weeks, possibly sooner than that if immediate changes need to happen.

Please take our playtest survey to give us feedback,

Also please follow us on twitter and join our discord to keep up on our development of this game.

Thank you!
